nodes.label: Illustrate plants with and without water and light
Healthy plant with vibrant green and strong growth
Unhealthy plant with drooping leaves labeled 'no water'
Unhealthy plant with pale, yellowing leaves labeled 'no light'
Comparison arrows indicating healthy vs. unhealthy conditions
Understands that water and light are crucial for plant health
Recognizes signs of dehydration in plants (e.g., drooping leaves)
Recognizes signs of insufficient light in plants (e.g., yellowing leaves)
Correct comparison between healthy and unhealthy plants
